# [Metaframe](https://metapages.org/): code/JSON editor


[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit#)


This metaframe shows code or config from input pipes and forwards to the named output pipe.

Allows editing and "saving" (saving pushes to output pipes).

## Example

Send code (on save) to a downstream metaframe that simply displays the content.

[ðŸ‘‡ Below example live ðŸ”—](https://app.metapages.org/#?)
